Class DataBundleGeneratorVerticle

java.lang.Object
io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.verticles.DataBundleGeneratorVerticle
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.vertx.core.Verticle
public class DataBundleGeneratorVerticle extends io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle
Verticle that handles creation of data bundles for Downloads.
Author:
Thomas Pfau

    • createDownload

      public void createDownload(io.vertx.core.eventbus.Message<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject> message)
      Create a Download for the given Information in the message. The message needs to have a "requestType" (participants, participant, tasks or task). participants/tasks need to be JsonArrays, task/participant are strings. along with a projectID for which to generate the download.
      Parameters:
      message - the message containing the JsonObject that describes what download to create.

    • getStatus

      public void getStatus(io.vertx.core.eventbus.Message<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject> message)
      Get the status of a download specified in the messages "downloadID" field
      Parameters:
      message - the message with the download ID.

    • getDownloadFiles

      public void getDownloadFiles(io.vertx.core.eventbus.Message<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject> message)
      Get the download files for the indicated downloadID. Returns the status of the download along with the files (if there are any)
      Parameters:
      message - The message containing the download ID.

    • checkForFileProblems

      public io.vertx.core.Future<List<Boolean>> checkForFileProblems(List<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject> filesIndicators)
      Check The given list of file indicators (more precise the "absolutePath" fields of the objects on whether they exist
      Parameters:
      filesIndicators - the "files" to check.
      Returns:
      A Future of a List of booleans where each true item indicates that the file at that position exists.
